      • smartParse

        public static Date smartParse(String date)
                       throws ParseException
        Tries various date formats to parse the date until one succeeds. The following date formats will be tried in order:
        1. UTC
        2. RFC822
        3. ISO8601
        4. "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a"
        5. "MM/dd/yyyy"
        An ParseException exception is thrown if unable to parse the string
        Parameters:
        date - A string representing the date to parse
        Returns:
        Date representing the parsed date string
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • now

        public static Date now()
